description.displayText:
Julie is a wonderful babysitter with my 2 month old baby boy. She has a lot of experience with toddlers and she s always on time and available even if it s last minute. Our son is always calm and relaxed in her arms. 

You won't regret having her.

Thanks
description.originalText:
Julie is a wonderful babysitter with my 2 month old baby boy. She has a lot of experience with toddlers and she s always on time and available even if it s last minute. Our son is always calm and relaxed in her arms. 

You won't regret having her.

Thanks

description.displayText: We hired Julie to temporarily care for our 23 month old son while my mother, who usually does our child care while I work part time, was recovering from surgery. She was  terrific! Our boy loved her and was excited each morning she came. She is very hands on. She was down at his level, playing with his puzzles, drawing and coloring, playing with his toys. She would take him outside for walks and go to a small playground near our home. She would read and sing. She is an asset to any family who is lucky enough to find her to care for their children. We were sad when our time together ended. We plan to use her for date nights and occasional babysitting because she is so wonderful. And if I ever needed care for my kids again, she would be the first person I would call.
